text.text:
Guests staying in RWS hotels need to show QRcode when using Taxi or HailCar to get into the Isle or get charged a toll of SGD$6 each time.
It's so silly.
How do you expect the guest to get the QRcode before checking in?

I think I would rather stay in MBS in marina bay area

text.text: I really enjoy the free parking benefit as a Gold Card holder, super convenient in terms of free-parking! The people gambling there are surprisingly friendly and have great teamwork, haha. Always a fun and welcoming vibe whenever I drop by.

originalText.text: I really enjoy the free parking benefit as a Gold Card holder, super convenient in terms of free-parking! The people gambling there are surprisingly friendly and have great teamwork, haha. Always a fun and welcoming vibe whenever I drop by.

text.text:
I was at the casino around end of October 2024.

Entrance was very easy with the present of passport and ICA confirmation email.

It was my first time so I had to make a member card, which is free. After filling some personal information, it take 5 mins to finish which was quick.

Now I could enter the poker area, blind are 5/10 or 10/20 ... but because no one  played with blinds 5/10 so I joined the 10/20$ table. It was 14h30 and there was only 2 tables open (total 4 tables).

I played until 8 PM and there were only 3 tables open. Maybe it was in week day so not much peoples could participate.

It was fun, even blind is quite big for me. If they have more variable of blind (1/2$, 2/3$ ...) it may attract more peoples. Players were also nice, I did had some chit/chat and they were open to discuss hands.

I will def return when I come back to Singapore.

text.text:
Resorts World Sentosa Casino mall offers a unique blend of upscale shopping, dining, and entertainment in a vibrant setting on Sentosa Island, Singapore. The mall is strategically integrated with the casino complex, creating a seamless experience where visitors can indulge in a variety of activities beyond gaming.

Dining options at Resorts World Sentosa Casino mall are equally impressive, featuring a range of cuisines from around the world. Whether you're in the mood for fine dining or casual fare, there are numerous restaurants and cafes to choose from, each offering a distinctive culinary experience.

Entertainment options add to the allure of the mall, with attractions such as theaters, spas, and nightlife venues ensuring there's something for everyone. The overall ambiance is sophisticated and welcoming, complemented by attentive service and a well-maintained environment.

For visitors to Sentosa Island, Resorts World Sentosa Casino mall provides a comprehensive destination where shopping, dining, and entertainment converge, making it a standout choice for leisure and indulgence in Singapore.

text.text: Very spacious, many slot machines, Roulette tables/screens, Baccarat, Black Jack etc. Roulette from 1SGD, 2,5,10 and so on except BJck which was 25SGD min. Do not forget to carry Cash Currency, No ATM inside the Casino, but located near to the entry of casino. Easy cash out systems inside casino. For foreigners generate DE number online (must). Carry your passport(must), No entry fee for foreigners. Multiple entries allowed. I stayed at Ora hotel, Casino is right at the doorstep of the hotel. Table Min. Bets changes in morning as compared to Night.
